content:
Captain Mo said,
He could tell it was marigold just by tasting it.
Phew... As expected of Captain Mo, knowing all sorts of things... <style=SizeSmall>I wish I knew that much about flowers too...</style>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
After you arrived,
there are several more shipments scheduled to come in,
but, they don't seem to be here yet...
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content: <size=30>I was so startled my tail shot straight up!</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
I need <color=#8AAB4B>5</color> <color=#8AAB4B>Zinnias</color>...
         <size=30>I didn't realize tea recipes needed to be this precise...</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
But I also rode in Sani's car!
<size=30>So I guess that "thanks for the trouble" 
goes for me too...</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
I'm organizing things
while checking the delivered goods.
Some bumps and bruises during transport are unavoidable, I suppose...
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
Oh right, I need a new notebook,
just for writing down Captain Mo's tea recipes.
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
If you've just moved in, you'll need toiletries for sure,
and a lamp too, oh and a blanket - it gets a bit chilly at night,
and for meals you'll need a small table, utensils...
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
Your clothes...
Oh right, we should stock up on some seasonal outfits.
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
...I've got a bad feeling about this.
<size=30>But asking Sani about it...
...that's even scarier!</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
Sorry, the Camp isn't completely set up yet,
everyone got here earlier than expected.
     <size=30>I had no idea Sani would drive that fast...</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
{什么？}
       <size=30>I saw Great-grandma!</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
And then, everyone came to help as soon as they arrived,
but Captain Mo said this works just fine too.
         <size=30>Then it must be okay!</size>
info: 采集花-过程中-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
I hope the damage to the goods is within expected range.
<size=30>Though maybe... damaged things
could have their own special uses...</size>

content:
Mhm, that's right!
If you don't follow the recipe carefully,
it might...

content:
And then, there's Captain Mo's tea drink,
something to really look forward to!
It's Captain Mo's legendary... special technique!

content:
Is there something wrong with the Astralink,
or could it be something else?

content:
I saw Sani excitedly running towards Captain Mo
with some strange-looking flowers—
and then Captain Mo sniffed them, and even took a taste!

content:

Thanks for making the journey here!
I got here a bit early though...
